summary: Contains three rune-enscribed Banded Iron Shields that unleash their magic when bashed.
descriptionHtml:
This is my second mod that I made a while ago and pretty much forgot about.
It adds 3 new shields to the game based on the Banded Iron Shield. On their fronts are inscribed the three magical runes that you can cast (fire,frost,shock). When bashing, the runes explode their magic onto the enemy with appropriate results.
The stats are as follows:

=Runic Fire Shield=
Armor-26
Bash-30 fire damage
Effect-15 fire damage over 3 seconds

=Runic Frost Shield=
Armor-26
Bash-30 frost damage
Effect-15 stamina drain

=Runic Lightning Shield=
Armor-26
Bash-30 shock damage
Effect-15 magicka drain

The shields can be found in the Hall of Attainment in Enthir\'s room (the black market magic merchant) in Winterhold College.
Alternatively you can craft them much like the Banded Iron Shield, with 4 iron ingots, 1 corundum ingot, and 1 leather strip, and additionally the respective rune scroll of the element (Fire, Frost, or Shock scroll).
They can also be tempered with 1 corundum ingot and a fire/frost/shock resist potion(the weakest of the resists).
Crafting and tempering the shields requires Arcane Blacksmith.

==Install==
Copy the contents of the folder into your Skyrim Data folder and merge.
Activate the esp

==Uninstall==
Deactivate the esp
Delete the RunicShield folders from the textures\\armor and meshes\\armor directories

As seen on Mod Spotlight:
[youtube]tfj93svAhSI[/youtube]

Any problems just message me. If you liked this mod check out my first one, a sword:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19040
